Package chefsProgram.controller

Class ChefsControlPanelController

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
chefsProgram.controller.ChefsControlPanelController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class ChefsControlPanelController extends Thread
The ChefsGuiController class. It will be used to control the chef's graphical interface (both ChefsControlPanel and ChefsOrderUpdateFrame) and it will contain a ListeningPost instance in order to ensure the communication with the Restaurant class (backend's facade controller). This class and its GUI will be running on a different device than the others in order to obtain a distributed system: that's the client, ListeningPost contains the server.

      public void addOrderToTableView​(int orderNum, int tableNum, MenuEntry entry)

      orderNum - specify the involved order's number.

      public void modifyOrderStatus​(int orderNum, OrderStatus status)

      Parameters:
      orderNum - specify the involved order's number.
      status - specify the new order status (OrderStatus object).

    • connect

      public void connect()
      Method used to establish a connection with the server. Through the start method it starts a thread which is always listening for messages from the server.

    • sendMessage

      public void sendMessage​(String message)
      Small method that writes a message to the server's socket.
      Parameters:
      message - specify the message to send to the server.

    • run

      public void run()
      Client thread main method. It's used to intercept messages from the server and, based on these, update the GUI.

      run in interface Runnable
